ClientExtension.description: The Client Extension for the theme css of a page

externalReferenceCode.description: The client extension's external reference code.

contentSubtype.description: The subtype of the content. i.e. the Structure name if it's a Structured Content.

contentType.description: The type of the content, i.e. Structure Content, BlogsPosting, etc.

additionalName.description: The author's additional name (e.g., middle name).

image.description: A relative URL to the author's profile image.

profileURL.description: A relative URL to the author's user profile. Optional field, can be embedded with nestedFields.

CustomField.description: A list of the custom fields associated with the structured content.

dataType.description: The field type (e.g., image, text, etc.).

name.description: The field's internal name. This is valid for comparisons and unique in the structured content.

data.description: The field's content value for simple types.

additionalProperties.description: The localized field's content values for simple types.

data_i18n.description: The localized field's content values for simple types.

DisplayPageTemplate.description: Represents a Display Page Template that has fields and is tied to a content type

availableLanguages.description: The list of languages the Display Page Template has a translation for.

items.description: The list of languages the Display Page Template has a translation for.

customFields.description: The custom fields associated to the page that renders the Display Page Template.

dateCreated.description: The Display Page Template's creation date.

dateModified.description: The last time any field of the Display Page Template was changed.

displayPageTemplateKey.description: The Display Page Template's external key.

markedAsDefault.description: Specifies if the Display Page Template is the default one for the content type.

siteId.description: The ID of the site to which this Page Template is scoped.

title.description: The title of the Display Page Template

uuid.description: A valid external identifier to reference this Display Page Template.

DisplayPageTemplateSettings.description: The Display Page Template's external key.

Geo.description: A point determined by latitude and longitude.

latitude.description: The latitude of a point in space.

longitude.description: The longitude of a point in space.

descriptionMappingFieldKey.description: Field of the content type that will be used as the description

imageAltMappingFieldKey.description: Field of the content type that will be used as the alt property of the image

imageMappingFieldKey.description: Field of the content type that will be used as the image

titleMappingFieldKey.description: Field of the content type that will be used as the title

version.description: The version of the JSON generated by page definition.

pageElements.description: A list of the page elements this page element has.

type.description: The page element's type (collection, collection item, column, drop zone, form, fragment, fragment drop zone, root, row, section or widget).

descriptionMappingFieldKey.description: Field of the content type that will be used as the description

htmlTitleMappingFieldKey.description: Field of the content type that will be used as the HTML title

robots.description: Robots of the page that renders the Display Page Template

additionalProperties.description: Internationalized field of the robots of the page that renders the Display Page Template

robots_i18n.description: Internationalized field of the robots of the page that renders the Display Page Template

globalCSSClientExtensions.description: The client extensions for global css associated to the page.

globalJSClientExtensions.description: The client extensions for global js associated to the page.

StyleBook.description: The StyleBook that is applied to the page.

bestRating.description: The highest possible rating (by default normalized to 1.0).

worstRating.description: The lowest possible rating (by default normalized to 0.0).

ContentDocument.description: A content document element that stores an image file.

additionalProperties.description: Block of actions allowed by the user making the request.
Block of actions allowed by the user making the request.

actions.description: Block of actions allowed by the user making the request.

contentValue.description: optional field with the content of the document in Base64, can be embedded with nestedFields

sizeInBytes.description: The document's file size in bytes.

ContentField.description: The list of fields that store the structured content's information.

dataType.description: The field type (e.g., image, text, etc.).

inputControl.description: The field's control type (e.g., text, text area, etc.).

name.description: The field's internal name. This is valid for comparisons and unique in the structured content.

nestedContentFields.description: A list of child content fields that depend on this resource.

repeatable.description: A flag that indicates whether this field can be rendered multiple times.

data.description: The field's content for simple types.

link.description: A link to a page on the server.

RelatedContent.description: A list of related contents to this structured content.

RenderedContent.description: A list of rendered content, which results from using a template to process the content and return HTML.

contentTemplateId.description: The ID of the template or display page used to render the content.

contentTemplateName.description: The name of the template or display page used to render the content.

additionalProperties.description: The localized names of the template or display page used to render the content.

contentTemplateName_i18n.description: The localized names of the template or display page used to render the content.

markedAsDefault.description: Specifies if the template or display page are marked as default to display the content.

renderedContentURL.description: An absolute URL to the rendered content.

renderedContentValue.description: Optional field with the rendered content, can be embedded with nestedFields.

StructuredContent.description: Represents content that has fields and is rendered by a template backed by a `ContentStructure`. This is modeled internally as a `JournalArticle`.

additionalProperties.description: Block of actions allowed by the user making the request.
Block of actions allowed by the user making the request.

actions.description: Block of actions allowed by the user making the request.

assetLibraryKey.description: The key of the asset library to which the structure content is scoped.

availableLanguages.description: The list of languages the structured content has a translation for.

items.description: The list of languages the structured content has a translation for.

contentFields.description: The list of fields that store the structured content's information.

customFields.description: A list of the custom fields associated with the structured content.

dateModified.description: The last time any field of the structured content was changed.

datePublished.description: The structured content's most recent publication date.

externalReferenceCode.description: The structured content's external reference code.

friendlyUrlPath.description: A relative URL to the structured content's rendered content.

additionalProperties.description: The localized relative URLs to the structured content's rendered content.

friendlyUrlPath_i18n.description: The localized relative URLs to the structured content's rendered content.

key.description: An identifier, independent of the database, that can be used to reference the structured content.

keywords.description: A list of keywords describing the structured content.

items.description: A list of keywords describing the structured content.

numberOfComments.description: The number of comments the structured content has received.

relatedContents.description: A list of related contents to this structured content.

renderedContents.description: A list of rendered content, which results from using a template to process the content and return HTML.

siteId.description: The ID of the site to which this structured content is scoped.

structuredContentFolderId.description: The ID of the folder where structured content is stored.

subscribed.description: A flag that indicates whether the user making the requests is subscribed to this structured content.

taxonomyCategoryBriefs.description: The categories associated with this structured content.

additionalProperties.description: The localized structured content's main titles.

title_i18n.description: The localized structured content's main titles.

uuid.description: A valid external identifier to reference this structured content.

StructuredContentLink.description: A link to structured content on the server.

TaxonomyCategoryBrief.description: The categories associated with this structured content.

embeddedTaxonomyCategory.description: Optional field with the embedded taxonomy category, can be embedded with nestedFields

taxonomyCategoryId.description: The category's ID. This can be used to retrieve more information in the `TaxonomyCategory` API.

TaxonomyCategoryReference.description: A unique reference to a taxonomy category.

externalReferenceCode.description: The taxonomy category's external reference code.

siteKey.description: The key of the site or asset library where the taxonomy category is located. It can be left out if the taxonomy category is in the same site as the page.

info.description: A Java client JAR is available for use with the group ID 'com.liferay', artifact ID 'com.liferay.headless.admin.content.client', and version '2.0.24'.
info.title: Headless Admin Content

get.description: Retrieves the display page templates of a site
Retrieves a display page template of a site

post.description: Renders and retrieves HTML for the page definition using the theme of specified site.

get.description: Retrieves the site's structured contents latest version. Results can be paginated, filtered, searched, flattened, and sorted.

delete.description: Deletes a version of a structured content via its ID.

get.description: Retrieves a version of a structured content
Retrieves all versions of a structured content via its ID.

post.description: Creates a draft of a structured content
